channel.title: Marlboro Menthol Smooths
channel.description:
Anyone ever have those?
After smoking some maryj for a while, I had one of these as a first cig and I have to say that was crazy. I didn't think cigs would make you feel that way. Extreme buzz. I've only had three but I get the same feeling each time. What do they put in those fuckers man, it's almost like a high.

item.title: Marlboro Menthol Smooths
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:55, topic:149066”][quote author=therealjdb link=topic=204356.msg1812139#msg1812139 date=1191893485]

Yeah like, empty out some, and mix them?

I usually use more weed than cig when I do that.

Yep, same here. I don’t smoke anymore but when I did, I did it that way. (I still smoke cigs though)
[/quote]

Oh, interesting. Most non-europeans I speak to have never heard of people smoking the herb with tobacco and find it strange. Maybe it depends on the area, hm.[/quote]
I know there are people around here who wont even smoke with people that are smoking a cigarette at the same time, they seem to think it ruins the bud or something lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Marlboro Menthol Smooths
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

zoltanman:

Call me stupid, call me whatever, I don’t care what you call me because I’m not stupid enough to even start smoking. Once you smoke one, you’ll want another, then another. I really find it funny I’m disliked because I don’t do drugs. There is a select few who are able to do drugs, and still be sucessfull. Majority of people are ignorant about drugs, so they abuse them or do them. Those storys I told you about my aunt and uncle, happen to alot. They were once really smart people, but once drugs influenced their life, they went down hill. The famous words always come from just normal drug users, “It’ll never happen to me”, but it does.

First off, nobody dislikes you for not doing drugs. The chastise your ignorant attitude towards those who do.
Second of all, you will not get addicted to anything by just trying it once. That is physically impossible.
Thirdly, “most people are ignorant about drugs”. This is true, but you fail to realise you fall into this category.
Lastly, I have never said “it will never happen to me”. My words would be more along the lines of “it is unlikely to happen to me, because I am careful.”

Read full topic

item.title: Marlboro Menthol Smooths
item.dc:creator: @i_own_i1 i--own--i
item.description:
@i_own_i1 wrote:

zoltanman:

Once you smoke one, you’ll want another, then another..

ROFL!!! Thats the biggest load of shit I have heard in a while… I started smoking in year 3 (friends parents smokes) and kept going until grade 8…I haven’t since then and don’t anymore…wait should I be addicted and still smoking them? No… I haven’t had a craving or anything and I don’t need them I had like 4 at a party a few months ago and after that I stopped, I stopped after 4…didn’t need another one…or another one or another one. So what you said is crap, you have no life experiences of your own so stop trying to convert everyone.

Read full topic

item.title: Marlboro Menthol Smooths

item.description:
@system wrote:

zoltanman:

Call me stupid, call me whatever, I don’t care what you call me because I’m not stupid enough to even start smoking. Once you smoke one, you’ll want another, then another.

Bullshit, most people find there first fag absolutely disgusting.

Read full topic

item.title: Marlboro Menthol Smooths
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Since we’re on the topic of drugs, I smoked last night, because I was just feeling like one. I wasn’t craving it, I just felt like a smoke again. I don’t smoke cigs to much, but when I do, I smoke Camel Filters or w/e, because my dad buys them. I also hate smoking, because I turn into an extremely violent person. I get pretty violent when I’m normal, but when I get high, I’m out of control. I passed out soon after smoking, and had 3 holes punched in my wall, and one hell of a sore fist. But back to topic, I’ve always thought cigs had the same effect, I guess not. I’ll have to look into MarlBoro Menthol Smooths.

Read full topic

item.title: Marlboro Menthol Smooths
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

You’re so freaking ignorant, and you call us ignorant.

You have NO idea what a real drug user or abuser is thinking, or will think, and you can’t say that you do. ESPECIALLY since you haven’t been in that situation before.

And no you will not be addicted after one. Cigarettes actually TAKE getting used to, most likely your first one will not be a good one. After one you’re not like OMG THEY’RE SO GOOD.

Read full topic
